Stories.story: There were two Hooks going for a walk, they met a Horse who was going to the Beauty Salon.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook > Horse

Stories.story: On the way to the Beauty Salon Horse asked a Fork for help, but Fork was trying to make a prank on him.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horse > Fork > Candle > Hook

Stories.story: Horse came to the Beauty Salon, Blower was right behind him when he and glassess arrived.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horse > Hook > Glasses > Blower

Stories.story: Blower was drinking the coffee Hook brought him, Horse's hair was messed up and fell into his coffee.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook > Blower > Candle > Horse

Stories.story: Inside, Horse could not enter until he leaves his horn.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horse > Cannon > Hook > Horse

Stories.story: Horse left his horn with Hook, who told Blower that he got the horn.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook >  Blower > Cannon

Stories.story: Glasses came in after waiting 10 minutes and Cannon welcomed him.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook >  Glasses >  Candle > Cannon

Stories.story: Inside Horse was afraid of Fork and jumped to the chair.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horse >  Glasses > Hook > Fork

Stories.story: Fork attacked Blower and the coffee fell on the floor.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Fork >  Blower > Candle > Hook

Stories.story: Fork was trying to escape and Cannon tried to call the police but he couldn't so Candle pushed his flame higher to light him up.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Fork > Cannon >  Candle >  Glasses

Stories.story: Hook came quickly to light Cannon but needed a spark, so he asked Candle for help.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook > Cannon > Hook >  Candle

Stories.story: Cannon finally fired and threw a watermelon toward Fork to stop him.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook > Fork > Cannon

Stories.story: Whistle arrived and Candle asked Glasses to tell Whistle what he saw.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle > Hook > Candle >  Glasses

Stories.story: Glasses was explaining to Whistle what he saw and cried in fear.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle >  Glasses > Hook >  Blower

Stories.story: Hook quickly came to the house to clean the warning sign So everyone knows that Fork is nearby
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hand Gel > Hook > Hand Gel

Stories.story: Fork attacked Hand Gel who had a little liquid to clean the sign. when Fork attacked him he got very angry and asked Candle to help him dry it.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Fork > Hand Gel > Hand Gel > Candle

Stories.story: The sign was clean and everyone could see the sign including Donut who freaked out.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hook > Hand Gel > Donut > Candle

Stories.story: It was late because Fork attacked Donut and Cannon tried to fire up to call the police.
Stories.order: Fork > Donut > Cannon > Hand Gel

Stories.story: Whistle arrived and asked Hand Gel to wash Horse.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle > Hand Gel > Hand Gel > Horse

Stories.story: Hand Gel apologized for not having enough fluid. Horse went to the beach and Donut wanted to go with him.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hand Gel > Horse > Donut > Hook

Stories.story: Whistle came in to keep an eye on Fork.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle > Fork > Fork

Stories.story: Fork went to the beach after Horse to get to Donut.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Fork > Glasses > Hook > Horse

Stories.story: Fork teased glasses and threw sand at him, Donut got scared because Fork is here for him.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Hand Gel > Glasses > Donut > Horse

Stories.story: Fork attacked Hand Gel and Hand Gel's friend asked Blower for help.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Fork > Hand Gel > Hand Gel > Blower

Stories.story: Whistle captured Fork. Hook saw it and called Blower who was at the sea sailing away.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle > Fork > Hook > Blower

Stories.story: Cannon controlled Fork and Whistle arrived on his horse.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horse > Whistle > Cannon > Fork

Stories.story: Whistle came and talked to Blower asking him to calm Cannon down.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle > Blower > Cannon > Fork

Stories.story: Cannon's friend arrived to take his turn to keep an eye on Fork.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Cannon's friend > Cannon > Cannon's friend > Fork

Stories.story: Cannon came to thank Whistle who asked Horse to calm Cannon.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Cannon > Whistle > Horse > Hand Gel

Stories.story: Blower went to greet his friend and shook hands with him but the noise called Whistle attention.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistle > Blower

Stories.story: At this time, Glasses received a gift for his support in capturing Fork.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Cannon > Glasses > Glasses's sister > Horse

Stories.story: Glasses went to ask for the gift.
Stories.order: Conversation order : Cannon > Glasses > Glasses's sister > Horse

Stories.story: Horse finally had the time to invite friends to his birthday.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horse > Hook > Glasses

Stories.story: While Hand Gel was cleaning Cannon for the birthday, Blower needed new glasses.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Blower > Glasses > Cannon

Stories.story: Whistle found out about the birthday when Candle came to show Glasses how to get there because he doesnâ€™t see at night.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Whistles > Candle > Glasses

Stories.story: Finally the Horses arrived and everyone was very happy to receive them.
Stories.order: Conversation order: Horses >  Candle > Cannon
